data.title: American Restaurant in Akron, OH
data.meta_description: Elegant spot for steak, seafood, wine & classic cocktails, plus weekly live entertainment. Located in Akron, OH.
data.meta_site_name: Dean Martin's Lanning's | American Restaurant in Akron, OH
data.text:
Now Open for Lunch!

Deano's Lounge is now open for lunch at 11:30am. Join us Monday through Friday for a variety of appetizers, sandwiches & salads.

All Glass Pours and Cocktails are $3 off during Lunch Hours!

Delivery Available Via UberEats & DoorDash

View Lunch Menu

Private Events

Dean Martin's Lanning's is proud to offer two private dining spaces.

The Martin Room seats up to 18 guests

Deano's Lounge can seat up to 52 guests

Our Event Staff are ready to create the ideal private event or business meeting for you.

Contact Us
